channel.title: [RSC] New Server Development
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
I have been playing on several rsc private servers, but now after i have started my own hosting company for counter-strike servers, so i thought i would give it a chance to try to host a rsc private server, all i will be needing is a dedicated, mature coder to help me setup the server, and i will be paying for the hosting.
My servers are hosted in a datacentre on stable 100/100mbit lines with 1gbit backbone.
What i would like the server to be like: As close to real RSC as pos, but with higher EXP rates. Skills to matter on the server for economy. Staking and PKing enabled ofcourse. F2P & P2P items enabled. All spells working
- If people have ideas on other things that would make a good rsc server i would love to hear them.
- If you happen to have interest in this, you can add me on msn, steam or replying here. MSN: msn@nrh.dk Steam: valhal_pc3 Mail: nicolai91h@hotmail.com
- Thanks in advance!

item.title: [RSC] New Server Development
item.dc:creator: @iPhone4 iPhone4
item.description:
@iPhone4 wrote:

Yeah um no, we don’t want your silly money. You bring nothing to the table except the claim that you have a server to host with but no credibility on if it will last more than the first month’s rent, of course it is probably connected to a residential ISP with no DDoS protection, based on your location. You aren’t going to bribe us to do your work for you with the promise of hosting it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Good luck on the project mate.
I would love to help out though I have no knowledge of developing something like that.

item.title: [RSC] New Server Development
item.dc:creator: @x_i_thug_i_x x i thug i x
item.description:
@x_i_thug_i_x wrote:

Marcelius, there is alot more than 100-300 players doing so, but fair enough.

  • DDoS protection is made.
  • Regarding a free coder, well if your a coder, would you rather pay for the hosting yourself, or would you be interested in an offer like mine, where you joined up and became a part of the leading staff ofcourse, but you didnt pay anything, except your own spare time.
  • Advanced PHP coder that is no problem, i have several friends and myself to code the things needed.

Last but not least i cant believe why people are so ignorant and immature to ddos each other and try to get other servers down 24/7, imo they should just be happy, them ore servers there are, the more players there would obviously come, and by time it could result in going into something huge. or maybe not.

But thats my words.

Read full topic

item.title: [RSC] New Server Development
item.dc:creator: @marcelius19 marcelius19
item.description:
@marcelius19 wrote:

Just to let you know,

~Its not the easiest thing to success in a RSC server, theres about 100-300 players in the whole word playing RSC!
~DDoS protection is most likely needed
~A free coder wont join your team
~Advanced php coder is needed aswell because kryptix wil most likely fuck you over if your website isn’t secure.

My opinion don’t waste your money on RSC! RSCEmulation will die sooner or later then RSC will be finely over!

Read full topic
